messages.message:
Team,
One of our customer was raising questions around get run status API.
The API link (https://docs.instabase.com/api-sdk/api-reference/runs/get-run-status) does provide the different status for a run, it would be helpful if there is a brief description for the each status and its behaviour.
E.g., Question from customer:  *When the Completed status code is received, does this mean the process was successfully completed or can we receive a Complete with errors and/or issues?* 
Completed V/s Failed V/s Stopped at Checkpoint - Difference in run error V/s extraction error V/s Validation error etc..
CC: @Matt Vielkind

• Completed
    ◦ Run successfully completed
    ◦ However, it's possible that certain fields failed to run and have a value like `"ERROR"`
• Failed
    ◦ Run failed to complete because of seom error
• Stopped at checkpoint
    ◦ A validation error was returned, so the run is paused

@Serena, Thanks for the content, we had already responded to customer, this request/feedback is towards documentation page update.
@Corey Brubaker, Could we add the brief explanation to the documentation page of run status API?
ah got it - then this would be a question for <!subteam^S03F4G5MV1N>
